subject: Testing classloader isolation?
msgSnippet: Does anybody have a good way to test behavior that depends on code in different classloaders communicating? That is, we have a client that should only use the
messageBody:
Does anybody have a good way to test behavior that depends on code in
different classloaders communicating? That is, we have a client that
should only use the classes in one jar talking to a server that should
only use the classes in another jar. It is trivial to test the
communications if I smush the classpaths together, but I want a
sensible way to restrict each of the parts to its own classloader,
preferably without preventing the suite from having both sets of
classes in its *default* classloader...
